item.title: Race for Giro's Pink Jersey
item.ExtractedText: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey Updated 2035 GMT (0435 HKT) May 23, 2016 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey Dutchman Steven Kruijswijk of team Lotto NL celebrates the pink jersey of the overall leader on the podium of the 15th stage of the 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, an uphill individual time trial between Castelrotto and Alpe di Siusi on Sunday, May 22. See moments from the previous days of the tour. Hide Caption 1 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey The peloton climbs the Gardena pass during the 14th stage of the 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, from Farra d'Alpago to Corvara on May 21. Hide Caption 2 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey Riders compete during the 13th stage of the 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, on May 20, from Palmanova and Cividale del Friuli. Hide Caption 3 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey Cyclists ride under heavy rain during the 12th stage of the 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, from Noale to Bibione on May 19. Hide Caption 4 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey The peloton rides past a field of poppies during the 11th stage of the 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, from Modena to Asolo on May 18. Hide Caption 5 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey The peloton rides during the 10th stage of 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, from Campi Bisenzio to Sestola on May 17. Hide Caption 6 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey French cyclist Benoit Vaugrenard of FDJ team cycles during the 9th individual time trial stage of 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, from Radda in Chianti to Greve in Chianti of 40,5 km on May 15, in Greve in Chianti. Hide Caption 7 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey The pack passes a curve on a mountain road during the 7th stage of 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, from Sulmona to Foligno of 211 km on May 13, in Foligno, Italy. Hide Caption 8 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey The pack rides past Rivello village during the 5th stage of 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, from Praia a Mare to Benevento of 233 km on May 11, in Benevento. Hide Caption 9 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey The pack rides during the 4th stage of 99th Giro d'Italia, Tour of Italy, from Catanzaro to Praia a Mare on May 10, in Praia a Mare, Italy. Hide Caption 10 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey Riders compete next to cows, during the third stage of the Giro d'Italia, in Nijmegen on May 8. Hide Caption 11 of 12 12 photos: Giro d'Italia 2016: Race for the Pink Jersey The peloton passes a windmill during stage two of the 2016 Giro d'Italia, a 190km stage from Arnhem to Nijmegen on May 07, in Nijmegen, Netherlands. Hide Caption
